doc.after: Compact cameras are intended to be portable pocketable and are particularly suitable for casual snapshots  Many incorporate a retractable lens assembly that provides optical zoom In most models an auto actuating lens cover protects the lens from elements Most ruggedized or water resistant models do not retract and most with superzoom capability do not retract fully
